## Testing Checklist

- [ ] Unit tests pass locally (`uv run pytest tests/unit`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass locally (`uv run pytest tests/integration`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass locally (`uv run pytest tests/e2e`)
- [ ] Code coverage maintained or improved
- [ ] Linter passes (`uv run ruff check src tests`)
- [ ] Formatter passes (`uv run ruff format --check src tests`)
